product_name: Ruffwear K-9 Dog Overcoat Utility Jacket
long_description: Made of 100% recycled polyester, the Ruffwear K-9 Overcoat utility jacket protects your precious pup from adverse weather. Great for dogs with thin coats and those unaccustomed to cold, wet conditions; neck, chest and belly coverage helps protect your dog. Wind- and water-resistant recycled polyester shell protects from the elements; luxuriously soft recycled fleece lining adds warmth. Covered auto-lock buckle closures and elastic webbing offer a personalized fit. 3M(R) reflective trim helps make your dog visible in low light. The Ruffwear K-9 Overcoat utility jacket remains securely in place during vigorous activities with refined sizing and a tailored fit.
short_description: Made of 100% recycled polyester, the Ruffwear K-9 Overcoat utility jacket protects your precious pup from adverse weather.
